thread.title: ‘Funny looking’ tiger statue removed by military after torrent of online humiliation
thread.title_full: ‘Funny looking’ tiger statue removed by military after torrent of online humiliation

author: RT
title: ‘Funny looking’ tiger statue removed by military after torrent of online humiliation
text:
‘Funny looking’ tiger statue removed by military after torrent of online humiliation Published time: 16 Mar, 2017 14:52 Get short URL The tiger has been mourned online. © hafizrancajale / Instagram They might have weapons but it seems the Indonesian military don’t have a sense of humor after removing a statue of a tiger from a military base for “looking funny.” The famed statue became the subject of an internet meme due to its cartoon-like features. 
Known as the ‘Cisewu Tiger’, the statue was removed on Monday after standing proud above the West Java military base for six years. The tiger is supposed to represent the mascot for the Siliwangi Military Command but his features have been deemed more welcoming than threatening. A post shared by Komang Hare Yashuananda (@hareyashuananda) on Mar 15, 2017 at 10:13am PDT Ini Harimau apa sih? Duh gusti! 😞 pic.twitter.com/ElBNudYyM3 — Vincent Candra (@halleluhellyeah) March 11, 2017 Jadi kepikiran, tapi kalo inget wajahnya malah bikin ngakak. #RipBangHariMauCisewu pic.twitter.com/FvpHDn2fz5 — Vincent Candra (@halleluhellyeah) March 13, 2017 
"Tigers should look fierce because they represent bravery and resilience," military spokesman Mokhamad Desi Arianto told AFP. "When some people criticized the statue for looking funny, we couldn't ignore it." 
The tiger recently became the subject of ridicule online and the subject of internet memes after garnering attention for its smiling face. Some very skilled Photoshop users skillfully placed the ‘Cisewu Tiger into movie posters and their own lives.
